text: Somewhere in the Night is a 1946 American psychological thriller movie directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz and starring John Hodiak, Nancy Guild, Lloyd Nolan, Richard Conte, Josephine Hutchinson, Sheldon Leonard. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1946 movies Category:1940s psychological movies Category:1940s thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz Category:Movies about amnesia
title: Somewhere in the Night (movie)
